owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getWithdrawAddress().notice: Allow single withdrawal destination. Preferably multisig/DAO treasury address.

initialiseOwnership(address).notice: Initialise vault and guard for a withdrawal destination.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Vault can receive tokens from a trade"

arguments.value: Vault can receive tokens from a trade

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Vault can receive tokens from a trade"

documentation.text: Initialise vault and guard for a withdrawal destination.

Allow single withdrawal destination.
 Preferably multisig/DAO treasury address.

Simple vault allowing delegating of a trading activites to a hot wallet.@author
 - Self-contained
 - Guard is used to check asset manager can only perform approved operations.
 - No shares, single owner
 - No accounting
